subject: RE: [junit] Unit testing Exception classes
msgSnippet: ... I can imagine that this complicates things. Fortunately I m working mostly on code that only has to run on 1.4+ - which tends to make my life much
messageBody:
> Typically I try to give my constructors correct exception chaining
> functionality in both Java 1.3 and earlier and Java 1.4 and later.

I can imagine that this complicates things. Fortunately I'm working mostly
on code that only has to run on 1.4+ - which tends to make my life much
easier... :)

Cheers, Ilja
